artist: Douglas Padilla; Packaged by Alexa Horochowski
creditline: Gift of the Weiser Family Foundation
description: packaged rectangular "collage" on corrugated cardboard; pink ground with black and white smears; orange and green cross at center; black, blue and orange border with white dots; packaged in plastic bag with cardboard hanging label stapled to top
dimension: 7 3/4 x 5 9/16 x 1/8 in. (19.69 x 14.13 x 0.32 cm) (including package)
signed: on back, in black: [Padilla / 2001 (on top of a pink shoe)]
title: Abstract Expressionism, from Trinket Carro/Chucher√≠a Cart
